com.github.dm.jrt.android.v11

Class JRoutineAndroid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dm.jrt.channel.Channels
      • com.github.dm.jrt.android.channel.AndroidChannels
        • com.github.dm.jrt.android.v11.channel.SparseChannels
          • com.github.dm.jrt.android.v11.JRoutineAndroid

  • public class JRoutineAndroid
extends SparseChannels
    Class acting as a façade of all the JRoutine library features, specific to the Android platform.

    See JRoutineAndroidCompat for support of API levels lower than 11.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 03/06/2016.

      • withStreamAccept

        @NotNull
public static <IN> LoaderStreamBuilder<IN,IN> withStreamAccept(@NotNull
                                                                        Consumer<Channel<IN,?>> consumer)
        Returns a stream routine builder producing only the inputs passed by the specified consumer.
        The data will be produced only when the invocation completes.
        If any other input is passed to the built routine, the invocation will be aborted with an IllegalStateException.
        Type Parameters:
        IN - the input data type.
        Parameters:
        consumer - the consumer instance.
        Returns:
        the routine builder instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the class of the specified consumer has not a static scope.

      • withStreamAccept

        @NotNull
public static <IN> LoaderStreamBuilder<IN,IN> withStreamAccept(int count,
                                                                        @NotNull
                                                                        Consumer<Channel<IN,?>> consumer)
        Returns a stream routine builder producing only the inputs passed by the specified consumer.
        The data will be produced by calling the consumer count number of times only when the invocation completes.
        If any other input is passed to the built routine, the invocation will be aborted with an IllegalStateException.
        Type Parameters:
        IN - the input data type.
        Parameters:
        count - the number of times the consumer is called.
        consumer - the consumer instance.
        Returns:
        the routine builder instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the class of the specified consumer has not a static scope or the specified count number is 0 or negative.

      • withStreamGet

        @NotNull
public static <IN> LoaderStreamBuilder<IN,IN> withStreamGet(@NotNull
                                                                     Supplier<IN> supplier)
        Returns a stream routine builder producing only the inputs returned by the specified supplier.
        The data will be produced only when the invocation completes.
        If any other input is passed to the built routine, the invocation will be aborted with an IllegalStateException.
        Type Parameters:
        IN - the input data type.
        Parameters:
        supplier - the supplier instance.
        Returns:
        the routine builder instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the class of the specified supplier has not a static scope.

      • withStreamOf

        @NotNull
public static <IN> LoaderStreamBuilder<IN,IN> withStreamOf(@Nullable
                                                                    Iterable<? extends IN> inputs)
        Returns a stream routine builder producing only the inputs returned by the specified iterable.
        The data will be produced only when the invocation completes.
        If any other input is passed to the built routine, the invocation will be aborted with an IllegalStateException.
        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:
        inputs - the inputs iterable.
        Returns:
        the routine builder instance.

      • withStreamOf

        @NotNull
public static <IN> LoaderStreamBuilder<IN,IN> withStreamOf(@Nullable
                                                                    Channel<?,? extends IN> channel)
        Returns a stream routine builder producing only the inputs returned by the specified channel.
        The data will be produced only when the invocation completes.
        If any other input is passed to the built routine, the invocation will be aborted with an IllegalStateException.

        Note that the passed channel will be bound as a result of the call, so, in order to support multiple invocations, consider wrapping the channel in a replayable one, by calling the Channels.replay(Channel) utility method.

        Type Parameters:
        IN - the input data type.
        Parameters:
        channel - the input channel.
        Returns:
        the routine builder instance.
